item.title: This energy stock will ‘pay you while you wait’ during market volatility, Miller Tabak’s Matt Maley says
item.description: The recent pullback in the market has provided an attractive buying opportunity for this energy play, according to Matt Maley.

item.title: Chaotic week for markets is a ‘textbook example of why you stick to your plan,’ financial advisors say
item.description: This week's volatility sent investors on a wild ride, but the ones who fare best in the long run have a plan and follow it.

item.title: These stocks could give investors shelter from the tariff economic slowdown, says Jefferies
item.description: In a Friday note, Jefferies identified a basket of stocks that are best positioned to hedge against the ongoing trade war.

item.title: Under-the-radar drug stock has big rebound potential here despite turmoil, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter breaks down the charts on large-cap pharmaceutical manufacturer AbbVie.

item.title: Retail investors are running head first into this topsy-turvy market
item.description: While the stock market whipsawed over recent days, average Joe traders saw an opportunity to buy the dip.
